'''Riku's Eggy Endeavor''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
#Give eight [[Bird Egg]]s to [[Riku]]

==Request Details==
Help Needed:<br />
I want to play, but my sister's busy at work, and I don't wanna disturb her.<br />
I wish I could be like a mother bird and hatch some little birds, so I'll have some people to play with.<br />
Could you find me {{Color|buzzword|8 Bird Eggs}}? I promise I'll do my best to hatch them!<br />
That way, I'll have all the friends I need!

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Narukami Island's Riku would like to have 8 Eggs.}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talking to Riku)
:'''Riku:''' Ah, an outlander! Hello!
:{{DIcon|Quest}} You want some Bird Eggs?
:'''Riku:''' If I had some eggs, I could be their mommy bird and hatch them into little birds. Then I'd have loads of bird friends to play with...
:'''Riku:''' So, did you get the 8 Bird Eggs that I mentioned in my commission?
:{{DIcon|Quest}} Here they are!
::'''Riku:''' Wow, thanks (mister/lady)! I'll be super careful with them, I promise.
:{{DIcon}} Not yet.
::'''Riku:''' Aw, alright. Well, hope they get here soon.
{{Dialogue end}}
